title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 28 2021
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 28 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Biden's big speech to Congress will be second coming of FDR, will propose huge tax increases, huge new spending programs. Rubio on absurd covid rules for Biden Speech. Gingrich on Biden's free tuition proposals. Rush on liberal state tax increases. Biden's "families plan". Rush on how liberals and conservatives define compassion. Biden shoots for the moon, even if he knows much of it will not be enacted. CDC releases ridiculous guidance on outdoor masks. Rush on the covid fatality rate and the power of positive thinking. James Golden, aka Bo Snerdley, on his new podcast: Rush Limbaugh: The Man Behind the Golden EIB Microphone. Caller: Rush was right to hope Obama failed, and we hope Biden fails.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Rush on the globalists who want to extend lockdown restrictions, kill small businesses, in order to have expanded government come to the rescue. With Biden set to propose massive tax hikes on "the rich", Rush explains who pays taxes. James Golden on his new podcast revealing the private side of Rush. New York caller on his family who hated "rich" people until it came time to pay inheritance taxes. A welder on what he wasn't taught in school, how much he earns by learning a trade.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Will Biden bash police tonight? Rush on the Obama-Biden plan to federalize local police forces through consent decrees, how Democrats have utterly failed minority communities. Study says giving to others makes you happy. Rush knew the secret to happiness incorporated giving to others. Caller on politicians who offer free stuff. Homeschool mom against universal "free" preschool. Rush on who pays taxes, part two. An unforgettable montage of Rush's spot-on descriptions of people. Tonight, revive Rush's old tradition of creating TV signs for big speeches by Democrat presidents.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
